articles.title: Chiranjeevi, South Indian divas attend actor Karthika Nair's wedding ceremony in Thiruvananthapuram | Onmanorama - Onmanorama
articles.description: Karthika who is the daughter of veteran actor Radha and Rajasekharan Nair, has worked in a couple of films in the South Indian industry.
